name: The Frankfurt Group & Holdings
tag_list: the-frankfurt-group, tfghcorp, film-financing, film-distribution, film-production, film-development
overview:
The Frankfurt Group & Holdings, or simply “The Frankfurt Group,” is an entertainment conglomerate holding company headquartered in Fort Worth, Texas, that oversees and manages a number of subsidiaries, specifically focusing on film financing, development, and distribution – The Frankfurt Group’s “slate fund” is a financially endowed business vehicle which specializes in the investment and acquisition of special interests.

The Frankfurt Group acquires companies and projects (particularly films) and provides them with the necessary capital, management, and business development to grow their infrastructure while still maintaining a controlling interest in the secured acquisition, often by serving as an co-producer and/or executive producer.

The Frankfurt Group leverages many financing mechanisms including debt, gap/supergap, and equity financing, as well as private equity, liquid and hedge funds.
